MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick, affecting properties in Weensland Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:46pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:34pm on 15th December 2020.
